/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and shapes fill the background, interspersed with trees that add a touch of green to the scene. Cars of different colors are scattered across the road, indicating a busy time of day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene.
